full_summary:
=====================================

### Used Heavy Harrows Tender Notice

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is seeking a proposal from a qualified Offeror to provide one set of used Heavy Harrows to the AAFC in Portage la Prairie, Manitoba.

#### Key Details

* **Reference #: WS4464034703**
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-12T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-31
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Portage de la Prairie, Manitoba

#### Additional Information

* The offeror must respond to this tender by submitting their proposal by June 12, 2024 at 14:00 HAE. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The selection criteria for this tender is Lowest Price.

#### Contact Information

* For additional information, please contact Lani Adatan, [lani.adatan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lani.adatan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the tender notice on Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19624329?extsite=MTk2MjQzMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19624329?extsite=MTk2MjQzMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Notices and Attachments

* This tender notice is posted on Ariba Discovery.
* The original tender description can be found on Ariba Discovery.
* There are no attachments to this notice. 

The winning Offeror will be selected based on their proposal, and the contract will be awarded to the Offeror with the lowest price once the evaluation process is complete. All Offerors must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
